Trade/Device Name(s): Clever Chek TD-4209 Blood glucose monitoring system
Clever Chek TD-4222 Blood glucose monitoring system
Clever Chek TD-4225 Blood glucose monitoring system
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for Clever Chek TD-4209/TD-4222/TD-4225 blood glucose monitoring systems for quantitative measurement of blood glucose using electrochemical method.
Indications for Use Summary: For quantitative measurement of glucose in fresh capillary whole blood from the finger and alternative sites by people with diabetes or healthcare professionals as an aid in monitoring diabetes control; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes mellitus.
